snippet.title: The Walking Dead: Betrayal – Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Betray your friends in this 5-8 person game of cooperation and social deception set in the universe of The Walking Dead.  Work together to survive, but trust no one! Traitors have so many ways to sabotage the team, the walkers are the most predictable threat.  Fight the Dead.  Fear the Living.  
 
Closed Beta is coming August 10th.  Wishlist and sign up for Beta Access today!
 
#TWDBetrayal #Steam #TheWalkingDead #SkyboundGames #OtherOcean #projectwinter 

Steam wishlist link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1877320
